message.body: Send me yr hrs and I will transfer money.
I think around 4pm. Waiting for their confirmation.
Ok I can go this afternoon. Just let me know when so I can schedule around it
Do they carry 5/4 poplar at lowes or depot?
Maaaaaybe. I gotta take that nail gun to Home Depot so I can check there.
Ok. Can u grab a box of contractor bags so I can get the company trash off my porch
FYI chicken and waffles at cedar park are bangin.
Also we are confirmed for 4pm at 309 S. 51st.

It's not worth trying to patch the ceiling. It will be a huge time suck, look terrible, create a giant mess and will make the other plaster more unstable. The whole ceiling needs to be replaced and there's no real quick and easy way around that. I would remove that from the estimate and knock off a few bucks or just skim it in a few spots
